actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the election as members of Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing, Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, and Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

summary.text: Elects Norman E. D'Amours of New Hampshire and Stanley N. Lundine of New York as members of the House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing. Elects James J. Florio of New Jersey to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Elects W. G. Hefner of North Carolina to the House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the election as members of Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing, Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs, and Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
